00041 namespace TREX {

00053     class MultipleInternals :public ReactorException {
00054     public:

00065                      TeleoReactor const &owner) throw();

00070     namespace details {
00071 
00072       class timeline;
00073 
00074     }; // TREX::transaction::details
00075 
00107     class Relation {
00108     public:
00109       typedef Relation        value_type;
00110       typedef Relation const &reference;
00111       typedef Relation const *pointer;
00112 
00113       typedef Relation      base_type;
00114       typedef utils::Symbol id_type;
00115 
00130       static id_type const &get_id(base_type const &rel) {
00131        return rel.name();
00132       }
00133       
00140       Relation()
00141        :m_timeline(NULL) {}
00148       Relation(Relation const &other)
00149        :m_timeline(other.m_timeline), m_pos(other.m_pos) {}
00151       ~Relation() {}
00152 
00172       bool accept_goals() const;
00173 
00174       void recall(goal_id const &g);
00175       void request(goal_id const &g);
00176       
00190       TICK latency() const;
00202       TICK look_ahead() const;
00203       
00222       IntegerDomain dispatch_window(TICK current) const {
00223        TICK lb = current+latency();
00224        
00225        return IntegerDomain(lb, lb+look_ahead());
00226       }
00227 
00237       bool valid() const;
00250       bool active() const;
00251       
00267       TICK               lastObsDate() const;
00281       Observation const &lastObservation() const; 
00282 
00294       TeleoReactor &client() const {
00295        return *(m_pos->first);
00296       }
00307       utils::Symbol const &name() const;
00320       TeleoReactor &server() const;
00321       
00333       bool operator==(Relation const &other) const {
00334        return m_pos==other.m_pos;
00335       }
00347       bool operator!=(Relation const &other) const {
00348        return !operator==(other);
00349       }
00350 
00357       pointer operator->() const {
00358        return this;
00359       }
00360       reference operator*() const {
00361        return *operator->();
00362       }
00381       Relation &operator++() {
00382        ++m_pos;
00383        return *this;
00384       }
00385 
00386     private:
00397       Relation(details::timeline *tl,
00398               details::client_set::iterator const &pos)
00399        :m_timeline(tl), m_pos(pos) {}
00400 
00401       void unsubscribe() const;
00402 
00403       details::timeline            *m_timeline;
00404       details::client_set::iterator m_pos;
00405 
00406       friend class details::timeline;
00407       friend class TeleoReactor;
00408     }; // TREX::transaction::Relation     
00409 
00410   } // TREX::transaction
00411 } // TREX

00413 #endif // H_Relation
